Uses of Interface
javax.jms.SyncMessageConsumer

    • Uses of SyncMessageConsumer in javax.jms

      Methods in javax.jms that return SyncMessageConsumer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SyncMessageConsumer MessagingContext.createSyncConsumer(Destination destination)
      Creates a SyncMessageConsumer for the specified destination.
      SyncMessageConsumer MessagingContext.createSyncConsumer(Destination destination, String messageSelector)
      Creates a SyncMessageConsumer for the specified destination, using a message selector.
      SyncMessageConsumer MessagingContext.createSyncConsumer(Destination destination, String messageSelector, boolean NoLocal)
      Creates SyncMessageConsumer for the specified destination, using a message selector.
      SyncMessageConsumer MessagingContext.createSyncDurableSubscriber(Topic topic, String name)
      Creates a durable subscriber to the specified topic and a SyncMessageConsumer which may be used to consume messages synchronously from it.
      SyncMessageConsumer MessagingContext.createSyncDurableSubscriber(Topic topic, String name, String messageSelector, boolean noLocal)
      Creates a durable subscriber to the specified topic and a SyncMessageConsumer which may be used to consume messages synchronously from it, using a message selector and specifying whether messages published by its own connection should be delivered to it.
